[theemo](./theemo.md) &gt; [WriterTool](./theemo.writertool.md)

## WriterTool interface

This is for tools used during the `sync` command and writes a named collection of tokens onto the disk in the tools required format.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface WriterTool 
```

## Example

Style Dictionary may be your writer tool and knows how to write the `properties/*` files

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [write(tokens)](./theemo.writertool.write.md) | Writes a named set to the disk in the format of the tool |
